title: Dominated by the Beast: An Erotic Fairy Tale
description: Don't go snooping in the west wing... unless you want to be punished.Mr. LeBeau wasn't looking for a live-in maid, but when Isabella arrives at his front door looking for work, he takes her in. To hide the scars from a motorcycle accident and avoid the nickname "Beast", the executive works from home, spending the majority of his time in the west wing of the manor. His only rule for Isabella is to keep out of the west wing, his only sanctuary. Isabella's curiosity is too strong, however, and while hoping to catch a glimpse of what is so forbidden, she gets much more than she asked for. A dungeon awaits with Mr. LeBeau as its master, and Isabella is due for some punishment. This modern take on a classic fairy tale is meant for adult audiences only, and is 5,200 words of erotic pain and pleasure!
author: Ella Black
